name: When a contact is updated on Mautic a new Google Sheets row is added
description: Every time a new contact is updated on Mautic, Make will automatically add a new row to a Google Sheet. This example uses the sheet [in this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1U5Y_YuhlwkmssgLdtVX7_DQNYvM9l-8ftMdoVPhp2GA/edit#gid=0).
